metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48318 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: No authorisation controls in the RestAPI documentation for Tribe29's Checkmk <= 2.1.0p13 and Checkmk <= 2.0.0p29 which may lead to unintended information disclosure through automatically generated user specific tags within Rest API documentation.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
